game.name: Bag of Dreams
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dream with us! Bag of Dreams is our new cozy, card-based Dreambuilder. Draw fragments and grow your dream space in pursuit of crafting the perfect dream, but look out for nightmares along the way...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dream with us! Bag of Dreams is our new cozy, card-based Dreambuilder. Draw fragments and grow your dream space in pursuit of crafting the perfect dream, but look out for nightmares along the way...
